text: Terry Sanderson (16 November 1946 â€“ 12 June 2022) was a British secularist and gay rights activist, author, and journalist. He was president of the National Secular Society from 2006 to 2017. He was a columnist for Gay Times. In 2021, Sanderson was diagnosed with bladder cancer. He died on 12 June 2022 from the disease, aged 75. ==References== Category:1946 births Category:2022 deaths Category:English journalists Category:English LGBT writers Category:Gay men Category:British LGBT rights activists Category:Writers from Yorkshire Category:LGBT journalists Category:People from Doncaster
title: Terry Sanderson (writer)
